column5: Welcome to my newly remodeled (2016) cottage in the popular Woodland Heights area of Houston. The location is ideal for downtown, Minute Maid Park, the Arts District, the Washington Avenue/ White Oak entertainment areas with its restaurants and nightlife. Freeway access is a snap, so getting to your sports or shopping venue is easy. We stocked the kitchen with all you need to prepare a gourmet meal, or to just brew that fresh cup of coffee in the morning. This home is a rental only.
column8: Woodland Heights Home - Convenient, Modern, Fresh
